attributes.action: Ban Muslim Type Squatter Toilets In Public Places
attributes.additional_details:
England is for the English. If people from other faiths and religious backgrounds want to come to England, they should have to adapt to the way we run our country. When I go to a mall and I need the bathroom, i don’t want to squat over a hole in the ground!
Thomas Crapper invented the loo for a reason, so that people could have comfort when using it.
